response:
I'll do my best to respond as your husband. Here's the list with one of us assigned to each phrase:

call you names - Steve
give you angry looks - Karen
put down your friends - Steve
say things to scare you - Karen
make you do something embarrassing - Steve
encourage you to open up - Karen
open to your ideas - You (since it's about being receptive to my thoughts)
excited to see you - Karen
listen attentively to you - Me
make an effort with your family - Karen
